CustomField.description: To be able to track the number of days for each step
CustomField.formula:
If(ISNULL(Questionnaire_Reviewed_Date__c),
(today() - datevalue(TAA_M_G_Actual_Call__c) - 2*( floor((today() - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((datevalue(TAA_M_G_Actual_Call__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))),
(datevalue(Questionnaire_Reviewed_Date__c) - datevalue(TAA_M_G_Actual_Call__c) - 2*( floor((datevalue(Questionnaire_Reviewed_Date__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((datevalue(TAA_M_G_Actual_Call__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))))
CustomField.label: #Days QR
